Factsheet

Developer:
RNG Party Games
Based in Indianapolis, IN
Release date:
4/18/22 (Launch title for Playdate)
Platforms:
Itch.io
Website:
rngpartygames.itch.io/bloom
Regular Price:
USD 9.99

Request Press Copy

Description

Bloom is a real-time narrative-driven social sim about starting up a flower shop made exclusively for Playdate. Tend to Midori's garden while texting friends and family as she starts a new chapter of her life. The game takes place over many real-life days.

History

Bloom began as a Ludum Dare 49 game in 2021. Between now and then, we've developed it into a full game with about 30 days worth of content. It's now slated to launch alongside the Playdate as the first commercial third party game, and is available for pre-order on Itch. If you would like to review/cover Bloom, please contact us at rngpartygames@gmail.com for a review copy!

Features

  • Respond to texts and tend to your garden in real time.
  • Check in over the course of many real-world days to see Midori's story unfold.
  • Experience a changing environment including a day/night and weather system.
  • Go for high scores in the arcade-style minigame and acquire daily collectibles.
  • Enjoy a relaxing lofi-inspired soundtrack as you play.

About RNG Party Games

Boilerplate
RNG Party Games is a 3-person indie game studio based in Indiana. We released our first commercial title, Backspace Bouken, in 2019. We're now working on Playdate games such as Bloom.
